content.description: After a competitive Game 2, the Chicago Sky and Phoenix Mercury traveled to Wintrust Arena in Chicago for Game 3 of the WNBA Finals. The Sky took hold of the game early and fed off of an energic Chicago crowd. Kahleah Copper scored 20 of her game-high 22 points in the first half and the Sky set the record for the largest margin of victory in a Finals game by 36 points. The Sky have a chance to clinch the franchisesâ€™ first WNBA title in Game 4 while the Mercury look to tie the series on Sunday, October 17th at 3PM ET.
content.name: Chicago Sky vs. Phoenix Mercury: WNBA Finals Game 3 Mini-Movie
